step1.title: Step 1: Open Telegram
step1.description: Open the Telegram app on your phone or computer and make sure you are logged into your account

step2.title: Step 2: Search for Bot
step2.description: Search for the bot username in Telegram, or

step3.title: Step 3: Send Binding Command
step3.description: Send the following binding command to the bot to complete account binding

validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.passwordsSame: New password cannot be the same as current password
validation.passwordsNotMatch: The two passwords entered are inconsistent

changePassword.title: Change Password
changePassword.newPasswordPlaceholder: Please enter new password (at least 8 characters)

resetSubscription.title: Reset Subscription Information
resetSubscription.description: Resetting your subscription information will clear all subscription-related settings and data, but will not affect your account.

changeEmail.title: Change Email
changeEmail.description: After changing your account email, the old email will no longer be able to log in. Please use the new email to log in.

validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.emailCodeInvalidFormat: Verification code format is incorrect, please enter 6 digits
validation.emailAlreadyRegistered: This email is already registered, please use another email

error.emailCheckFailed: Email check failed, please try again later
error.fixErrors: Please fix all validation errors before submitting
error.sameEmail: New email cannot be the same as current email

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.description: This operation will permanently delete your account and all related data, and cannot be recovered.

modal.title: Confirm Account Deletion

warning.title: ⚠️ Danger Operation Warning
warning.description: This operation will permanently delete your account and all related data, cannot be recovered. Please enter your email address to confirm deletion.

modal.emailError: Email address is incorrect, please enter {{email}} to confirm deletion

telegramGroup.title: Telegram Discussion Group
telegramGroup.description: Join our Telegram discussion group to exchange experiences and share tips with other users

description.bound: Bound account: {{telegramId}}, receive service notifications and important messages
description.unbound: Bind Telegram bot to receive account notifications, service status and important messages

autoRenewal.title: Auto Renewal
autoRenewal.description: Automatically renew subscription when it expires to ensure uninterrupted service, deducted from wallet balance

autoResetTraffic.title: Auto Reset Traffic
autoResetTraffic.description: Automatically reset traffic when subscription is not expired but traffic is depleted, ensuring uninterrupted service, deducted from wallet balance

emailSubscriptionReminder.title: Subscription Expiry Reminder
emailSubscriptionReminder.description: Send email reminders when subscription is about to expire

trafficUsageReminder.title: Traffic Usage Reminder
trafficUsageReminder.description: Send email notifications when traffic usage reaches threshold

systemNotification.title: System Notification
systemNotification.description: Receive important notifications about maintenance, updates, coupons, and more

warning.title: Confirm email change?
warning.description: This operation will require you to re-verify your identity and log in with the new email

resetSubscriptionConfirm.title: Confirm Reset Subscription Information
resetSubscriptionConfirm.warning: After resetting subscription information, clients need to update subscription again. This operation will clear all subscription-related settings and data.
resetSubscriptionConfirm.confirmDescription: After reset, you need to reconfigure all subscription-related settings

telegramUnbindConfirm.title: Telegram Bot Unbind
telegramUnbindConfirm.warning: Are you sure you want to unbind the Telegram bot?
telegramUnbindConfirm.description: After unbinding, you will not receive Telegram notifications. You can rebind at any time.
